page.title: 11ORCHESTRA
page.content: On Friday afternoons I go to{wind band in the school. Two parents come in, Mrs. Payne and Mrs. Castro, and teach us many different pieces of{music.} There are about fifteen of us, all middle school pupils. We meet in the school hall, after afternoon play and practice right through to 3.3O p.m., the end of school. The main instruments are{flutes, clarinets, {recorders.} We don't play classical music, just well known pieces. Sometimes we go to Southam, our local town, to play to the blind or disabled people. We also perform in our school plays. Most of us who come to wind band have another music lesson with a lady called Mrs. Morris who teaches us new notes, timing as well as improving our technique. I practice at weekends, its hard work, but its for fun.
